sentences.en: -- Behold me here, the one sinner of the world!
sentences.cn: —— 向这儿看, 看看我这个世上的罪人吧!

sentences.en: " Behold your papers, Jarvis Lorry, countersigned. "
sentences.cn: “ 看看你们的证件吧! 贾维斯-罗瑞,已经签过字了. ”

sentences.en: A well-executed shot of a tall ship is a joy to behold.
sentences.cn: 欣赏优秀的高桅横帆船摄影作品是种乐趣。

sentences.en: Adam had awakened from his deep sleep, and behold! There was Eve.
sentences.cn: 亚当已经从酣睡中苏醒了, 看吧! 夏娃就在那里.

sentences.en: And now behold a new trend of affairs.
sentences.cn: 现在来看一看事情的新趋势吧.

sentences.en: Behold a series of thrilling photographs of Felix.
sentences.cn: 看费利克斯拍的一系列惊心动魄的照片。

sentences.en: Behold, the new king is crowned.
Behold! What a beautiful sight it is!
sentences.cn: 看 呀 !这风景多么美丽!

sentences.en: He leapt on a rock, from whence he could behold the sea.
sentences.cn: 他跳到一块可以观望大海的岩石上.

sentences.en: He was a joy to behold.
Her face was a joy to behold.
My heart leaps up when I behold the rainbow in the sky.
sentences.cn: 我一看到天空的虹,我的心就扑通地跳.

sentences.en: She looked into his eyes and beheld madness.
sentences.cn: 透过他的眼睛，她看到了疯狂。

sentences.en: The ebb and flow of the sea is certainly a sight to behold.
sentences.cn: 海潮的涨落确实是个奇观.

sentences.en: The sunrise at the seaside was quite a sight to behold.
We behold the face of nature bright with gladness.
sentences.cn: 我们常常从光明、愉快的方面去看自然界的外貌.

phrases.tran_cn: 你瞧（表示惊讶的感叹词）

trans.tran_en: to see or to look at something – sometimes used humorously

trans.tran_cn: 瞧，用在祈使句中以引起人注意
